meta.name: description
meta.content: Official website of Banks County, Georgia. Access the Banks County Government, Banks County Chamber of Commerce, Banks County Convention & Visitors Bureau, and Banks County Economic Development with a click.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Banks County Georgia, County Government, chamber of commerce, convention and visitors bureau, economic development

div.div: County Government: It is the mission of Banks County Government to provide responsive, innovative, and cost effective services, promote smart growth, effectively communicate with the community, preserve the health, welfare, safety, and environment while maintaining the outstanding quality of life that makes our county a desirable place to live and work.

Chamber of Commerce: The mission of the Banks County Chamber CVB is to promote existing business, new business and agricultural opportunities; promote, further develop and support the tourist industry in Banks County; and act to enhance the economic growth and well-being of the Banks County Community.

Convention & Visitors Bureau: Between Atlanta and Greenville, Banks County is your oasis Where the Fun Shines. Offering almost 1000 hotel rooms, stay here if you race cars, follow college sports, appreciate wonderful shopping, or love the outdoors.
Economic Development: Banks county is riding a rising tide of economic prosperity, and all the tools are in place for your business to benefit along with us.
